articles.title: Tata Tiago now available in Arizona Blue colour - Team-BHP

articles.title: Singaporeans may soon be able to take a holiday again: airline association - Coconuts Singapore
articles.description: After being stuck on this tiny island over a year without much to do, Singaporeans could finally get the green light to escape for fun or to reunite with loved ones abroad.

articles.title: IDBI Bank is free of RBI’s intensive care, but will it fly? - Mint
articles.description: IDBI Bank's provision coverage ratio is now 97% and its net non-performing assets are below 2% from the peak of 18.76%.The bank has also improved its leverage ratio and jacked up its provision coverage ratio to cover for risky assets
